headline: Securing Minnesota's Skies
subheadline: A Data-Driven Plan to Neutralize Aerial Threats
threatNarrative: From critical infrastructure to public events, our state's most vital assets are vulnerable to aerial surveillance and attack. The incident at Prairie Island Nuclear Plant was a clear warning.

targets.title: Nuclear Facilities
targets.description: Unauthorized drones were confirmed over Prairie Island, yet operators were never found. This intelligence gap is a critical failure.

targets.title: Stadiums & Events
targets.description: U.S. Bank Stadium and the State Fair are prime targets for disruption or panic-inducing attacks, mirroring national trends.

targets.title: MSP International Airport
targets.description: A single drone can halt all air traffic, causing millions in economic damage and posing a direct threat to passenger safety.
